mapper.select: select id, name, volume, cost, date_updated as dateUpdated, shop_id as shopId from items where is_deleted = false
select id, name, volume, cost, date_updated as dateUpdated, shop_id as shopId from items where shop_id = #{shopId} and is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into items (id, name, volume, cost, shop_id) values (#{id}, #{item.name}, #{item.volume}, #{item.cost}, #{item.shopId})
mapper.update: update items set name = #{name}, volume = #{volume}, cost = #{cost}, shop_id = #{shopId}, date_updated = now() where id = #{id}
update items set is_deleted= true, date_updated = now() where id = #{id}
